co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

Interface Reconfigurable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeDatasetDefinition, CounterTimeseriesTableDefinition, IndexedObjectStoreDefinition, IndexedTableDefinition, KeyValueTableDefinition, TimeseriesTableDefinition

    public interface Reconfigurable
    Interface implemented by DatasetDefinitions that have a way to reconfigure the dataset properties. It is optional for a dataset type to implement this interface; if not implemented, the dataset system will assume that no compatibility check is required and call DatasetDefinition.configure(String, DatasetProperties) instead to obtain the new dataset specification.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatasetSpecification reconfigure(String instanceName, DatasetProperties newProperties, DatasetSpecification currentSpec)
      Validates the new properties, including a compatibility check with the existing spec, and returns a new dataset specification for the dataset instance.

    • Method Detail

      • reconfigure

        DatasetSpecification reconfigure(String instanceName,
                               DatasetProperties newProperties,
                               DatasetSpecification currentSpec)
                                 throws IncompatibleUpdateException
        Validates the new properties, including a compatibility check with the existing spec, and returns a new dataset specification for the dataset instance.
        Parameters:
        newProperties - the updated dataset properties, to be validated by this method
        currentSpec - the current specification of the dataset
        Returns:
        a new dataset specification, created from the new properties
        Throws:
        IncompatibleUpdateException - if the new properties are not compatible with the existing dataset
